remarks: An isomorphism in the category of non-unital rings is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 28-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcsect.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcsect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcsect.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcsect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngcsect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
rngciso.n $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
rngciso $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X I Y ) <-> F e. ( X RngIsom Y ) ) ) $.
